item.title: How to Use Tallow Balm If You Wear Makeup
item.description: How to Use Tallow Balm If You Wear Makeup Tallow balm NZ isn‚Äôt just for bare skin‚Äîit works perfectly with makeup, helping create a smooth, hydrated base without clogging pores. 1. Using Tallow Balm as a Primer ‚úî Start with clean skin. ‚úî Apply a tiny amount of tallow balm ‚Üí Warm in hands and press into skin. ‚úî Let it absorb for 2-3 minutes before applying foundation. üí° Pro Tip: Use less balm if you have oily skin, or let it fully absorb before applying makeup.

item.title: Choosing the Right Tallow for Sensitive Skin: What to Look For
item.description: Choosing the Right Tallow for Sensitive Skin Not all tallow balms are the same. If you have sensitive skin, eczema, or allergies, choosing the right tallow is key to avoiding irritation. 1. Suet-Based Tallow Is the Best for Sensitive Skin ‚úî Comes from the kidney fat of grass-fed cows ‚Üí The purest form of tallow. ‚úî Naturally white, odorless, and rich in nutrients. ‚ùå Avoid dripping-based tallow, which is often greasy and yellow.

item.title: What Is Tallow Balm? Ingredients, Uses, and Benefits
item.description: What Is Tallow Balm? Tallow balm is a natural, deeply moisturizing skin balm made from beef tallow. It‚Äôs packed with nutrients that help repair and hydrate the skin. Unlike commercial creams filled with synthetic ingredients, tallow balm NZ is simple‚Äîjust pure, skin-loving fats that support healthy skin. What Is Tallow Balm Made Of? The main ingredient in tallow balm is beef tallow, which comes from high-quality, grass-fed suet (the firm fat around the kidneys).

item.title: What Is Tallow Balm Made Of? Ingredients & Benefits
item.description: What Is Tallow Balm Made Of? Tallow balm is a simple, natural moisturizer that deeply hydrates and heals the skin. item.title: Why Does Tallow Balm Go Grainy? (And Why Ours Doesn‚Äôt)
item.description: Why Does Tallow Balm Go Grainy? (And Why Ours Doesn‚Äôt) If you‚Äôve used tallow balm NZ, you may have come across some that feel grainy or uneven. It‚Äôs a common issue, and people making tallow balms in NZ will often tell you it‚Äôs normal. While the balm still works, graininess doesn‚Äôt have to happen. At PrimalCare, we‚Äôve refined our process to ensure a consistently smooth, whipped texture. And if your balm ever arrives grainy, we‚Äôll refund you‚Äîour Grain-Free Guarantee means you never have to settle for rough, uneven balm.
